about_the_game: Don't miss the exclusive Monster Energy Supercross - Bluefire Custom Rider Pack.  Fire up the race with this custom rider set containing: helmet, goggles, jersey, pants and boots not included in game! It includes a Shaei VFX-W helmet, Progrip 3450 goggles, Axo Grunge jersey and pants and a pair of Gaerne SG12 boots.
detailed_description: Don't miss the exclusive Monster Energy Supercross - Bluefire Custom Rider Pack.  Fire up the race with this custom rider set containing: helmet, goggles, jersey, pants and boots not included in game! It includes a Shaei VFX-W helmet, Progrip 3450 goggles, Axo Grunge jersey and pants and a pair of Gaerne SG12 boots.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K; AMD FX-6350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 with 2 GB VRAM or more; AMD Radeon HD 7800 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD FX-8350 Eight-Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4 GB VRAM or more; AMD Radeon R9 380 with 4 GB VRAM or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
